mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_mt_common_prop ( `prop_id`, `prop_parent_id`, `prop_name`, `prop_type`, `action_type`, `platform_prop_ref_id`, `rules`, `defult`, `is_comm`, `is_code`, `tips`, `value_type`, `created`, `creater`, `modified`, `modifier` ) VALUES( #{propId}, #{propParentId}, #{propName}, #{propType}, #{actionType}, #{platformPropRefId}, #{rules}, #{defult}, #{isComm}, #{isCode}, #{tips}, #{valueType}, now(), #{creater}, now(), #{creater} )
